item.title: [Delta] Logout message [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

[quote=“jmk600, post:3, topic:394167”]And? Want me to post my logout?

public void logout() { try{ killMyNPCs(); //iframe server.panel.removeListModelItem(playerName); //end if (inCombat) { } if (validClient(duel_with) && duelFight) { getClient(duel_with).DuelVictory(); } else { declineDuel(); } if(inPitsGame){ inPitsGame = false; PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1; println_debug(playerName + " resetted pits!"); } resetfollowers(); savegame(true); outStream.createFrame(109); if(playerRights == 1) { yell("@or1@[Moderator]@bla@ "+ playerName +" has just logged out."); } if(playerRights == 2) { yell("@whi@[Administrator]@bla@ "+ playerName +" has just logged out."); } //logoutButton = true; } catch (Exception Ex_) { } }[/quote]

Check to see if your logout method is called anymore in your client class.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Logout message [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

And? Want me to post my logout?

public void logout() { try{ killMyNPCs(); //iframe server.panel.removeListModelItem(playerName); //end if (inCombat) { } if (validClient(duel_with) && duelFight) { getClient(duel_with).DuelVictory(); } else { declineDuel(); } if(inPitsGame){ inPitsGame = false; PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1; println_debug(playerName + " resetted pits!"); } resetfollowers(); savegame(true); outStream.createFrame(109); if(playerRights == 1) { yell("@or1@[Moderator]@bla@ "+ playerName +" has just logged out."); } if(playerRights == 2) { yell("@whi@[Administrator]@bla@ "+ playerName +" has just logged out."); } //logoutButton = true; } catch (Exception Ex_) { } }

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Logout message [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“jmk600, post:1, topic:394167”]Alright, so I put this in my public void logout();

if(playerRights == 1) { yell("@or1@[Moderator]@bla@ "+ playerName +" has just logged out."); } if(playerRights == 2) { yell("@whi@[Administrator]@bla@ "+ playerName +" has just logged out."); }

And whenever they logout, it spams it 3 times. How can I make it so where it doesn’t say it 3 times, just once.[/quote]

Hm, either the code you posted is already in there twice, or the logout() method is being called twice in other locations.

Or it’s not setting the player to be “logged out”, and so it keeps sending the message until they are.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Logout message [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

Alright, so I put this in my public void logout();

if(playerRights == 1) { yell("@or1@[Moderator]@bla@ "+ playerName +" has just logged out."); } if(playerRights == 2) { yell("@whi@[Administrator]@bla@ "+ playerName +" has just logged out."); }

And whenever they logout, it spams it 3 times. How can I make it so where it doesn’t say it 3 times, just once.
